mapper.insert: insert into artistapply (artistNo, id, artistName, artistImg, artistType, artistIntroduce, artistRecord, artistInstagram, applyResult) values (#{artistNo}, #{id}, #{artistName}, #{artistImg}, #{artistType}, #{artistIntroduce}, #{artistRecord}, #{artistInstagram}, 0)

insert into artistapply (artistNo, id, artistName, artistImg, artistType, artistIntroduce, artistRecord, artistInstagram, applyResult, originArtistNo, artistWorld) values (#{artistNo}, #{id}, #{artistName}, #{artistImg}, #{artistType}, #{artistIntroduce}, #{artistRecord}, #{artistInstagram}, 2, #{originArtistNo}, #{artistWorld})
mapper.select: select * from artistapply where artistNo=#{applyNo} limit 1
mapper.update: update artistapply set applyResult=false, refusedContents=#{refusedContents} where artistNo=#{applyNo }
